timer.ttsUnavailableDescription: The selected text-to-speech voice is unavailable on this device. Interval titles won't be read unless you change the selected voice.

form.title: Timer title
form.ttsVoice: Text-to-speech voice for reading interval titles
form.ttsInfo: Not all voices are available on all devices
form.ttsPreview: Enter some text to preview the selected voice

drawer.description: Choose between different types of timer intervals to create a fully customized timer

meta.title: Timer
meta.description: Create timers with custom intervals and rhythms. Name each interval and hear it aloud—perfect for workouts, focus sessions, and more.
